Text: Thanks my friend! You are the greatest! :-)

Let me be first to THANK YOU for letting us around the world to enjoy this great excellently produced TV program. Greetings from the region of freezing rain and blowing snows, Southern Ontario. Cheers to all~!!
Thanks from New Zealand.....
Thank you!
Thank you VeroVenlo, that was a great sharing, because of you I was able to follow the x factor. Thanks again

Well done Vero. Always there, always reliable, always good quality. Thank you so much for letting me and others keep up with the x factor I am otherwise unable to keep up with. I don't know what I'd do without you.

Vero,all of us here in Cyprus want to thank-you so much,for the time and effort you have put in this season,its very appreciated.We want to also say Merry Christmas to you and yours and 'see you next season'
Regards
Cyprus X fACTOR JUNKIES.

Thank you so much verovenlo for all you have done.
Every weekend my mum and I sit down and watch this show together, all the way from australia. We couldn't have done this without your help.

So thank you very very much. And I look forward to you uploading the last of xtra factor soon :D.

p.s. you should try x264 next year :).
Thanks for uploading through the series vero, oh and merry xmas
BIG thank you from Norway for all the effort and great work you have done!
30 times thanks for uploading every episode!
ty buddy, you have been king of us who arent in uk, im hoping to hear from you soon, are u going to upload american idol, its start january 19th
Thanks!!! Can't wait for next season. Greetings from Serbia. :)
Many thanks for all of your efforts and your time in giving this to us every week, we REALLY do appreciate this, kind regards from The Philippines
Thanks from Montreal for this series - much appreciated!
yep till next time merry x-mass and a happy new year to every one

thanx bro ;)
merry x-mass and a happy new year to you too!
I will not be able to say enough thanks for your uploads, so I do not even try. Without you I would not be able to watch the whole season so THANK YOU!!!

Hey Vero. My turn to say a huge THANK YOU !

You allowed me to spend so much great week ends cos, as soon as I finished my week end parties with my friends, I came back home knowing that my friend Vero had loaded my favourite show. 
I've enjoyed it and I'm gonna watch the last episode right now !

Thank you again and, as I told before, you are a friend for us cos you brought so much happiness to lots of people...(just have to read the amazing comments :-)

See ya soon and thanks for your great great job and patience !
Thanks from India for the thirty reliable X factor uploads, you came through for us every week :-)
thank you for posting all of season 7
you are the best .. mmmwah
thank you soo much for this entire season's worth of episodes :)
